title: EnrichLayer Data Enrichment
author: Andrew Mayfield
description: Use EnrichLayer's API for B2B data enrichment
overviewMarkdown:
## EnrichLayer Data Enrichment

### Available Functions:
- **Person Profile**: Get detailed LinkedIn profile data
- **Company Profile**: Get comprehensive company information
- **Person Lookup**: Find LinkedIn profiles by name and company

### Setup:
1. Get your API key from [EnrichLayer Dashboard](https://enrichlayer.com/dashboard)
2. Enter it in the plugin settings

### Usage Examples:
- "Enrich the profile https://www.linkedin.com/in/williamhgates"
- "Get company information for https://www.linkedin.com/company/microsoft"
- "Find the LinkedIn profile for Satya Nadella at Microsoft"

### Costs:
- Person Profile: 1 credit
- Company Profile: 1 credit (+ extra for premium data)
- Person Lookup: 2 credits

**Rate Limit**: 300 requests/minute (standard accounts)

### API Documentation:
https://enrichlayer.com/docs/pc/
